name: Creamy Parmesan Italian Sausage Soup
description: A tasty Italian sausage and pasta soup with a creamy parmesan and tomato broth!
ingredients: 8 ounces pasta such as ditalini (gluten-free for gluten-free)
instructions: Cook the sausage and onion in a large saucepan until cooked, breaking the sausage apart as it cooks, before draining any excess grease. Add the garlic, fennel, and red pepper flakes, mix, and cook until fragrant, about a minute. Add the broth, tomatoes, pasta, and Italian seasoning, bring to a boil, reduce the heat and simmer until the pasta is cooked, al-dente, about 6-8 minutes. Add the parmesan, cream cheese, and cream, and let the cheeses melt into the soup, about 3-5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste, mix in the parsley and enjoy!
